---
format: html
theme: default
---
::: {=html}
<style>
body {
  background-color: #040113ff;
}



#bg-video {
  position: absolute;        /* or fixed if you truly want it behind everything */
  top: 0; left: 0;
  width: 100%;               /* fill the container’s width */
  height: 100%;              /* keep its aspect ratio */
  object-fit: cover;       /* don’t crop or zoom—show the full frame */
  z-index: -1;
}

/* --- Woodworking image grid --- */
.wood-grid {
  position: relative;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(240px, 1fr));
  gap: 18px;
  margin: 2rem 0 3rem 0;
  z-index: 1; /* above bg video */
}
.wood-card {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 16px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.06);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.20);
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.35);
  transition: transform 160ms cubic-bezier(.2,.8,.2,1), box-shadow 160ms cubic-bezier(.2,.8,.2,1);
}
.wood-card:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 10px 26px rgba(0,0,0,0.45); }
.wood-card img {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  aspect-ratio: 4 / 3; /* keep consistent tiles */
}
.wood-cap {
  position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
  padding: 10px 12px;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  color: #f0f0f0;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.55) 100%);
}

/* Lightbox styles */
#lightbox {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.85);
  display: none;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 9999;
}
#lightbox img {
  max-width: 90%;
  max-height: 90%;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
}

@media (max-width: 640px){
  .wood-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(160px, 1fr)); gap: 12px; }
  .wood-card { border-radius: 12px; }
}

</style>
:::
<video autoplay muted loop playsinline id="bg-video">
  <source src="scholar.mp4" type="video/mp4">
</video>


<div class="wood-grid">
  <figure class="wood-card">
    <img src="images/project1.jpg" alt="Project 1" loading="lazy">
  </figure>
  <figure class="wood-card">
    <img src="images/project2.jpg" alt="Project 2" loading="lazy">
  </figure>
  <figure class="wood-card">
    <img src="images/project3.jpg" alt="Project 3" loading="lazy">
  </figure>
  <figure class="wood-card">
    <img src="images/project4.jpg" alt="Project 4" loading="lazy">
  </figure>
</div>
<div id="lightbox">
  <img src="" alt="">
</div>
<script>
  const lightbox = document.getElementById('lightbox');
  const lightboxImg = lightbox.querySelector('img');
  document.querySelectorAll('.wood-card img').forEach(img => {
    img.addEventListener('click', () => {
      lightboxImg.src = img.src;
      lightbox.style.display = 'flex';
    });
  });
  lightbox.addEventListener('click', () => {
    lightbox.style.display = 'none';
    lightboxImg.src = '';
  });
</script>
